transcript:
Customer: Jai Hanuman gyan gun sagar jai kapi sati

Customer: Aadha do minute hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha boliye. Ha yogesh ji se baat ho rahi hai meri?
Executive: Ha madam ji boliye.
Executive: Hello sir main pallavi baat kar rahi hu india mart noida head office se kaise hai sir aap?
Customer: Ha ha ha boliye boliye boliye madam acha hua aapko kisi aur ka phone aaya main pareshan ho gaya na.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir aapke jo account manager hai na main unhi ki manager baat kar rahi hu sir unse aapka discussion hua tha.
Customer: Ki chutti pe the aap aaj tak?
Executive: Sir main chutti pe to nahi thi aapka concern aa gaya hai.
Customer: Unko bol raha hu person ko mere ko number de do ya call connect karo mera paisa mere ko refund de do wo to bol rahe nahi ho pa raha main bola aapne mere se aise likh ke to nahi liya ki mera paisa mera plan activate deactivate nahi ho sakta refund nahi mil sakta.
Executive: Sir mujhe pura issue bataye kya problem aa raha hai kahan pe issue aa raha hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi madam abhi hai na mere kya bolte ho mera gala dukh raha hai abhi kya hua pain ho raha hai batate batate subah se wo aapka kya naam hai wo wo mohammad kya naam hai unse baat kiya fir unhone kisi ko phone diya unse baat kiya main mera kya mera energy pura waste ho raha hai kya hota hai mera kam nahi hai ki main itna matlab bar bar aap aapke team pura baat kar lo ji bataye agar aapko issue malum hai to theek hai nahi malum hai to aap aapki team se baat kar lo fir mere se call karo.
Executive: Nahi sir mujhe aapse baat karni hai kyuki sir dekhiye aapko pata hai.
Customer: Main main baat kar raha hu mere ko are madam ji main kya batau aapko.
Executive: Sir dekhiye package aise cancel dekhiye main jitna mujhe samajh mein aaya hai aapko apna 30 ka package cancel karana hai sir ab time ho chuka hai ab hum dekhiye renewal aapka generate hone wala hai ab hum aise to refund nahi kara sakte hai na sir service one year ki aapne li.
Customer: To mere ko aap mail dal dijiye ki main ye jo package hai na mera mail id hai firm ka main aapko deta hu us pe aap mail dal dijiye ki ye package humne offer kiya tha aur ye abhi refund nahi ho sakta paisa aise ek mail dal dijiye.
Executive: Sir aapko sir aap mere ko wo mail de dijiye jahan pe refund ke liye bola gaya hai aap usse better hai na ki aap mere ko wo wala mail de dijiye jahan pe refund ke liye bola gaya hai sir dekhiye aapko sir aap problem nahi bataoge aap irritate hoge to solution de paungi bataye.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi bataye sir aapka direction galat ja raha hai aap pehle baat samajh ke lijiye main kya bol raha hu aapka product aapne mujhe becha hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Ya main agar mera product samne wale ko terms and condition mujhe jyada malum hai na main mera product bech raha hu to kahan pe dikkat aata hai kya nahi to ye mujhe aapne starting mein batana chahiye tha na to ab main mail kis liye lunga mera customer kaun hai ya mere se mere ko kisne product becha hai aapne becha hai.
Executive: Sir aap mujhe in short problem to bataye are aap beech beech ki baat kar rahe hain.
Customer: Are beech beech ki baat kar raha hu to aapne baat aapko wahi problem hai aapke jo log hai na wo bechne pe matlab wo jyada unka samne ka matlab wo likhne ki capacity kam hai shayad main aapko kya bola thodi der pehle agar aapko malum nahi take your time aap pura aapki team ke sath discuss kijiye mere ko kal call kar dijiye theek hai mera koi problem nahi hai.
Executive: Sir suniye ek baat bataye sir suniye yogesh ji yogesh ji meri baat suniye.
Customer: Are yaar fir wahi aap aap irritate ho rahe hain sir mujhe pata hai wo cheez mujhe pata hai main aapko nahi ho raha main aapko sorry bol rahi hu agar kuch bhi hamare side se problem aapko aayi hai.
Customer: Aapse sorry bolne se mera paisa wapas aayega kya main aapke logo ko bhi bataya main jo aapka paisa mera jo ja raha hai na wo kam se kam char din ka mera mahine char din ka main jab 12 ghante kam karta hu na chalo a ghante kam kar lo utna mera profit hai wo char din ka.
Executive: Koi nahi ek kam karte hain sir abhi aap bhi aapke paas bhi kafi calls aayi hai aap bhi thoda sa shant ho jaiye main aapko aaram se call karungi uske baad baat kar lenge abhi mujhe nahi lagta aap bhi baat karne ke liye abhi ye jo aap bol rahe shant ho jao ye mera shant wala hi tone hai aapko main batau aap kabhi bhi call karoge na mere ko aapko yahi tone sunne ko aayega meri bas ek seedha straight and forward aapko question hai.
Executive: Sir aap itni irritate ho rahe hain aapki date mein main isse bol rahi hu.
Customer: Nahi wo mere ko aadat hai main kya business aaj nahi chalu kiya 2021 se business chal raha hai khali india mart ko ek saal pehle connect kiya hai to mere paas to bahut local wale bhi customer aate hain kuch to bas mat pucho mat main aapko bata hi nahi sakta as a gender ladies aise customer ko main handle karta hu but abhi aap to professional ho mera kehna yahi hai aap take your time aapke sath discuss karo main aapko agar nahi hota mere ko refund karna mera ek mail dal do bas.
Executive: Sir matlab jo aapne bataya aapke paas aaye the kya bola unhone bataye main servicing team se hu sir suniye india mart ke founder dinesh dinesh kumar hai na to unka bhi contact number nikalne wala hu kyuki main chodne wala nahi hu main aapko bata raha hu bar bar mere liye wo paisa bahut mayne rakhta hai agar aap galat tarike se aapke log mere ko proof mang rahe hain to main aapko abhi ulta proof mang raha hu.
Customer: Theek hai na main aapko bata raha hu.
Executive: Aapko kya bataya gaya tha service kab khatam hogi aap mujhe ye bataye sir aapko kab ki kab ka duration bataya tha.
Customer: Chalo madam ek kam karte hain.
Executive: Sir aap agar kuch bhi nahi batayenge sir to main solution nahi de paungi main main agar senior baat kar rahi hu to sir aapko mujhe issue batana padega please try to understand.
Customer: Main aapko aap agar kuch bhi nahi batayenge to solution nahi mil payega sir aapko.
Customer: Nahi nahi suniye aap department ho aap senior ho main bhi ek MNC company mein 18 saal kam kar chuka hu 2019 mein maine mera job chhoda hai abhi.
Executive: Sir main aapse comparison nahi kar rahi hu aap businessman hai main employee hu.
Customer: Nahi suniye na aap thoda aapki listening capacity badhaiye main kya bol raha hu agar aap department head ho to pehle aapke jo colleague hai unko bulao unko pucho kya hua hai main bar bar wo repeatedly bata bata ke mera abhi pak raha hai sir theek hai main refund mang rahe hain aap refund mang rahe hain sir kya issue hai ye to bataye na.
Customer: Abhi ye pehla service ka time khatam ho raha hai sir paisa kya karenge department ke logo ko pucho na main aapko wahi bata raha hu aapke under jo kam karte hain unko pucho na main kitni bar har ek agar phone karte aayega to main har ek ko wahi cheeze bar bar nahi dohra sakta na.
Executive: Sir yogesh aap samajh rahe ho kya sir main bilkul aapki baat samajh rahi hu sir suniye sir thoda shanti se meri baat suniye.
Customer: Sir to simple hai take your time aapke department mein meeting bula lo ya online meeting bula lo.
Executive: Sir baat karni padegi take your time sir main apna time leke kuch nahi kar paungi mujhe aapko solution dene ke liye aapse baat karni padegi sir.
Executive: Aap nahi baat kar paungi mujhe kisi se kuch nahi puchna hai sir mujhe aapse baat karni hai ab aap bataye aap kab time de payenge uske hisab se baat kar lete hain sir.
Customer: Chhod do madam kam down main bola na aapko suggestion diya na main har ek ko bata nahi sakta theek hai.
Executive: Sir solution fir aise to hum nahi de payenge na aapko aap bataye kaise solution de payega aapko.
Customer: To aap aapka meeting jo bhi hai to agar aapke log are aapke log kya kar rahe hain aap center kam karte hain na unhone bataya nahi aapko main bar bar wahi cheeze dohra raha hu.
Executive: Main bol to rahi hu mere paas yahi update aaya hai ki sir ko kuch service duration ka bataya gaya tha aur wo refund mang rahe hain ab.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi fir unko pucho.
Executive: Ye cheez to maine.
Customer: Madam unko pucho na kyu mang rahe hain wajah to rahegi na i am a professional i am a b mechanical engineer main aisa koi raste pe thoda kela thodi bech raha hu aapko bol raha hu mera paisa de do aisa thodi hai aap kya baat kar rahe hain.
Executive: Kya commitment hua hai aap bataye na commitment ya kya hua hai.
Customer: Bar bar bol raha hu mera pura waste ho chuka hai aaj ke din mein.
Executive: Tabhi to bol rahi hu sir aap time bataye main tabhi bol rahi hu aap aap mujhe time bata dijiye.
Customer: Main aapko bata raha hu aap issue aapke team se samajh ke lo fir mere se baat karo main aapko team se mujhe itna hi update mila hai isse jyada update mujhe nahi mil paya hai.
Executive: Aap mujhe baki ka solution dene ke liye aapse baat karni hai.
Customer: India mart wale ko bol raha hu suno liye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a refund for a package.

- Customer says his energy is being wasted.

- Customer says his team is not competent.



Resolution:

- Executive listened to the customer's concerns.

- Executive asked the customer to explain the issue.

- Executive suggested the customer calm down.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, service, team
